com.google.errorprone

Class ErrorProneAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.errorprone.ErrorProneAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.source.util.TaskListener

    public class ErrorProneAnalyzer
extends Object
implements com.sun.source.util.TaskListener
    Used to run an error-prone analysis as a phase in the javac compiler.

        public void reportReadyForAnalysis(com.sun.source.util.TaskEvent taskEvent,
                          com.sun.source.util.TreePath path,

        Reports that a class is ready for error-prone to analyze.
        Parameters:
        path - the path from the compilation unit to the class declaration
        hasErrors - true if errors have been reported during the compilation
